listening_on.name: listen
listening_on.description: address that this server listening to, defalt to 0.0.0.0

webapp_host.name: webapp
webapp_host.description: the domain name that the webapp being hosted on, including http:// or https:// prefix, defalt to http://127.0.0.1

my_port.name: port
my_port.description: port that this server listening to, defalt to 5000
